name: GuessTheCapital
0:
”Alexa, open Guess The Capital”
”Alexa, start Guess The Capital”
”Alexa, launch Guess The Capital”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: guess the capital
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With this skill you can learn about animals around the world by answering alexa questions.


Stay updated on Smart Skills also on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/smartskills.it

To add this skill on your Alexa Routines, please do the following:

Enable this Alexa skill.
On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
Click + to add a new routine.
Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
Choose "Your Skills".
Select this skill.
Click Next.
Choose Device to perform the routine to.
Click Save.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
